overview:
Managing Director (Asia & Europe) for the Red Herring.

A commercial and entrepreneurial manager with more than 12 years’ experience in Marketing & Business Development. Gained knowledge and direct sales experience in launching and conducting due diligence on life sciences, medical devices, media/publishing, and retail businesses.
